content:
I don't know if this falls under the libs team. But I'd like to work towards getting a subset of the APIs under proc_macro_span stabilized as I've mentioned under the corresponding RFC.

The first step seems to be to start separating out APIs under a new feature flag. So far I've set up a branch which includes a change to move these three items under a new feature flag tentatively named proc_macro_line_column.

The way proc-macro2 handles unstable APIs does make this a bit more involved, so I'd like to ask here for guidance in how I can champion moving forward with this change. Given the provenance of the crate It seems appropriate to coordinate this as much as possible.

In particular I'm interested in @David Tolnay's opinion, since they seem to be the person currently most involved with the proc-macro2 crate right now.

So how would I go about this?
